import React, { useState , useEffect } from 'react'; import SideMenu from '../component/SideMenu'; import "./Type_dossier.css"; import InputClient from '../component/InputClient' import axios from 'axios'; import bgImage from "../video/background-img.mp4" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const AddClient = () => { const [form , setForm] = useState({}) ; const [errors, setErrors] = useState({}); const [greffier , setGreffier] = useState([]) ; useEffect(()=> { axios.get('/api/greffier') .then (res=> { setGreffier(res.data) }); },[]) const onChangeHandler = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name] : e.target.value , }) } const onSubmitHandler = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); axios.post('/api/gestion_client', form) .then(res=>{ alert(res.data.message) }) .catch(err=>setErrors(err.response.data)) } return (
